author: China Uncensored
description:
Find your representative: https://www.congress.gov/members/find-your-member
Contact your representative and tell "Congress must tell the UK to stop the Chagos archipelago deal, for US national security."

The UK is handing the Chagos Islands to Mauritius—and that could put America’s most important Indian Ocean military base at risk. Thanks to Chinese influence and a fragile lease deal, the US could be forced out of Diego Garcia, giving China a massive strategic advantage. Here’s why this deal matters, how it could unravel, and what it means for a future war with China.

Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.

title: The US Lost a Military Base to China
